projects.title: Gamba Gun
projects.description: An ongoing action roguelike game project, developed by 'Nolamo Softworks'. My contributions focus on refactoring the project and managing development of supporting gameplay systems, specifically the GPU-based splats, enemy AI and localisation systems.

projects.title: California V2
projects.description: A vastly overhauled update for the 2019 'California' map for Unturned. The project had 6 years of development time with 5-6 active developers at any given time from many countries. This update featured a greatly expanded map, gameplay loop and increased visual fidelity.

projects.title: Wang Slime
projects.description: A slime mold simulation combined with wang tiles. Slime agents navigate a simple procedurally generated map which can be updated at runtime. This is possible as the simulation is entirely ran on the GPU.

projects.title: Sistor Fixor - Prototype
projects.description: A prototype for a Digital Logic Sim puzzle game. Developed in 2 days, the focus of the game is more on problem solving than real-world accuracy. Still, it is accurate for all the simplistic operations present.

projects.title: Dungeon Generator
projects.description: A fast dungeon generator based on the backtracking and a weighted random selection, created as a final assignment for CMPM 146. Dungeon generation style was inspired by 'The Binding of Isaac'.

projects.title: Spebby's Chess Engine
projects.description: A basic Chess Engine & AI programmed in C++ using Dear ImGui as a graphical front-end. The engine makes use of bitboards and negamax for its inbuilt AI, and can play to depth 5 in near realtime.

projects.title: Booliards
projects.description: A fast-paced retro-styled arcadey billiards action game with classic charm. I worked on game design, wave design, achievements, Newgrounds integration and backend architecture.

projects.title: Egg Rush
projects.description: A cracking beat-em-up staring a rotten egg, created as a submission for the Newgrounds July Jam 2021. Developed in 3 days! I worked on core gameplay systems, upgrades and enemy behaviour.

projects.title: Tower of Towers
projects.description: A charming 16-bit platformer, and winter of 'Best Technical Quality' in Andr√© Young's 'Game Jaaj 5'. Development was ~2 weeks for the initial release. I worked on level design, core features, Newgrounds integration and localisation.

projects.title: Easter Island
projects.description: In development for a little under a year, Easter Island is an officially endorsed 'curated' modding project for the hit indie game Unturned. It was featured in-game in February 2020, and remains permently accessible (though no longer preinstaled). Work on this project was primarily level-design, game balancing, project & team management and 3D art based.

projects.title: Freighter
projects.description: Second place winner of the community-hosted '2019 June MapJam'. Development was 2 weeks, and was the first major project I worked on that released.
